title._content: [Three unidentified soldiers, probably of Company B, 23rd Ohio Infantry Regiment, with revolvers and sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Three unidentified soldiers, probably of Company B, 23rd Ohio Infantry Regiment, with revolvers and sword] 1862 March 13. 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.2 x 8.1 cm (case) + Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Handwritten note in case: "Taken at Raleigh, Virginia, by Corporal [Addison A.?] Udell, March 13th, 1862, Co. "B" 23rd Regt. O.V.I." Case: Leather, scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: Heritage Auctions, Dallas, Texas, 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States.--Army.--Ohio Infantry Regiment, 23rd (1861-1865)--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Manuscripts--1860-1870. Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32093 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2785
